value.title: Harstem ABUSES most OP unit against my Protoss team | Commander Mode #3 - StarCraft 2
value.excerpt: What is Commander Mode? It is Archon Mode vs another streamer/player where we are the Commanders of our squadron of noobs but we can't actively control anything ourselves, we can only command them what to do!
